trans-unit.source: Multiplies two 32-bit values and then divides the 64-bit result by a third 32-bit value

seg-source.mrk: Multiplies two 32-bit values and then divides the 64-bit result by a third 32-bit value

target.mrk: Multiplies two 32-bit values and then divides the 64-bit result by a third 32-bit value

trans-unit.source: Specifies the number by which the result of the multiplication is to be divided

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the number by which the result of the multiplication is to be divided

target.mrk: Specifies the number by which the result of the multiplication is to be divided

trans-unit.source: The result of the multiplication and division

seg-source.mrk: The result of the multiplication and division

target.mrk: The result of the multiplication and division

trans-unit.source: (-1), if either an overflow occurred or $iDenominator was 0

seg-source.mrk: (-1), if either an overflow occurred or $iDenominator was 0

target.mrk: (-1), if either an overflow occurred or $iDenominator was 0

trans-unit.source: If the result is a positive half integer (ends in .5), it is rounded up.

seg-source.mrk: If the result is a positive half integer (ends in .5), it is rounded up.

target.mrk: If the result is a positive half integer (ends in .5), it is rounded up.

trans-unit.source: If the result is a negative half integer, it is rounded down.

seg-source.mrk: If the result is a negative half integer, it is rounded down.

target.mrk: If the result is a negative half integer, it is rounded down.
